alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 10:57AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...Scattered moderate to heavy snow showers will continue to affect northeastern Piscataquis...Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties until 1145 AM EDT... At 1034 AM EDT...Scattered moderate to heavy snow showers were moving east at 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Kent, Madawaska, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Allagash, Deboullie Mountain, Portage, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Ashland, Easton, Woodland, Frenchville and Bridgewater. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 291 and 304. US Highway 1 between Houlton and Fort Kent. State Highway 11 between Knowles Corner and Fort Kent. * Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Brief snow covered roads are possible with isolated icy spots as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
